%========================================================================================
% Document type
%========================================================================================

\newcommand{\paperdim}{a4paper}
\documentclass[\paperdim, 11pt]{article}


%========================================================================================
% Packages
%========================================================================================

\usepackage[left=1.5cm,right=1.5cm,top=3cm,bottom=2.5cm, headheight=1cm]{geometry}% http://ctan.org/pkg/geometry
\usepackage{graphicx} % Required for including images
\usepackage{microtype} % Improved typography
\usepackage{multirow} % multirow in table
\usepackage{booktabs} % Required for nice horizontal rules in tables
\usepackage{wrapfig} % Required for in-line images
\usepackage{float} % Required for forcing figures not to float with the [H] parameter
\usepackage{lipsum}% http://ctan.org/pkg/lipsum
\usepackage{array}% Define specific alignments in tables
\usepackage{fancyhdr}% Define specific header and footer
\usepackage{hyperref}% Hyperref colors
\usepackage[hyperpageref]{backref} % Backref in the references
\usepackage[dvipsnames]{xcolor} % enable X color names
\usepackage{tocloft} % Change toc dot
\usepackage[nottoc, notlof, notlot]{tocbibind} % Entries in toc, lof, lot for references
\usepackage{amsmath} % Formula

%========================================================================================
% ToC
%========================================================================================

\renewcommand{\contentsname}{Summary}
\renewcommand{\cftsecleader}{\cftdotfill{\cftdotsep}}


%========================================================================================
% Header and footer
%========================================================================================

% Clear the default layout
\fancypagestyle{logo}{%
  %pagestyle definition
  \fancyhf{}

  % Build the new layout
  \renewcommand\footrule {}
  \renewcommand\headrule {}

  \lhead{\includegraphics[width=\linewidth]{logo-blue_3952x360.png}}
  \rhead{\LARGE{\IPTitle} \\[0.7cm] \normalsize{revision \IPRev\ -- \IPDate}}
  \lfoot{}
  \rfoot{}
}

\fancypagestyle{content}{%
  %pagestyle definition
  \fancyhf{}

  % Build the new layout
  \renewcommand\footrule {
    \begin{minipage}{1\textwidth}
      \includegraphics[width=\linewidth]{line-blue_3952x14.png}
    \end{minipage}\par
  }

  \renewcommand\headrule {
    \begin{minipage}{1\textwidth}
      \includegraphics[width=\linewidth]{line-blue_3952x14.png}
    \end{minipage}
  }

  \lhead{\includegraphics[width=4cm]{logo-small-blue_927x78.png}}
  \rhead{\IPTitle}
  \lfoot{revision \IPRev\ -- \IPDate}
  \rfoot{Page \thepage}
}


%========================================================================================
% Links
%========================================================================================

\hypersetup{
  colorlinks,
  citecolor=MidnightBlue,
  filecolor=MidnightBlue,
  linkcolor=MidnightBlue,
  urlcolor=MidnightBlue
}


%========================================================================================
% bibliography
%========================================================================================

% Bibliography cite style
% \bibliographystyle{plainnat}
\bibliographystyle{alpha}

% Backref style:
\newcommand{\mapolicebackref}[1]{
    \hspace*{\fill} \mbox{\textit {\small #1}}
}
% Manage backref
\renewcommand*{\backref}[1]{}
\renewcommand*{\backrefalt}[4]{%
  \ifcase #1
  \mapolicebackref{pas de citations}
  \or \mapolicebackref{(cited on page #2)}
  \else \mapolicebackref{(cited on pages #2)}
  \fi
}


%========================================================================================
% Fonts
%========================================================================================

\usepackage{charter} % Use the Charter font as the main document font
\usepackage{courier} % Use the Courier font for \texttt (monospaced) only
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc} % Use T1 font encoding


%========================================================================================
% Start Document
%========================================================================================

\input{iptitle.tex}
\begin{document}
%-----------------------------------
% First page
%-----------------------------------
\begin{titlepage}
  \thispagestyle{empty}
  %-----------------------------------
  % Logo
  %-----------------------------------
  \noindent
  \begin{minipage}{0.5\linewidth}
    \includegraphics[width=2.005\linewidth]{logo-blue_3952x360.png}
  \end{minipage}
  \noindent
  \begin{minipage}{0.5\linewidth}
    \begin{flushright}
      \LARGE \IPTitle\\[0.5cm]
      \normalsize revision \IPRev\ -- \IPDate
    \end{flushright}
  \end{minipage}\\[1cm]
  %-----------------------------------
  % Brief & Feature
  %-----------------------------------
  \begin{minipage}[t]{8.25cm}
    \section*{Brief}
    \input{brief.tex}
    \section*{Features}
    \input{features.tex}
  \end{minipage}
  \hspace{0.4cm}
  \noindent
  %-----------------------------------
  % Short description table
  %-----------------------------------
  \begin{minipage}[t]{8.25cm}
    \section*{Short description table}
    \input{iptable.tex}
  \end{minipage}
\end{titlepage}

%-----------------------------------
% Tables ToC etc
%-----------------------------------
\newpage
\tableofcontents
\listoffigures
\listoftables
\thispagestyle{empty}

%-----------------------------------
% Content
%-----------------------------------
\newpage
\pagestyle{content}
\input{revisions.tex}

%-----------------------------------
% Content
%-----------------------------------
\newpage
\pagestyle{content}
\input{content.tex}

%-----------------------------------
% References
%-----------------------------------
\newpage
\pagestyle{content}
\input{references.tex}

\end{document}
